title: Setup
goal: Initialize the project, configure development tools, and establish the basic project structure.

tasks.description: Create Next.js project with TypeScript, `npm init next-app . --ts`
Configure ESLint for linting and Prettier for code formatting.
Set up Jest and React Testing Library for testing.
Define and implement initial folder structure as per `plan.md` (e.g., `frontend/src/components`, `backend/src/api`).
Configure Vercel deployment for CI/CD setup (initial `.github/workflows/main.yml` or similar).
Implement basic performance monitoring/logging setup (e.g., simple console logs for operation duration).

title: Foundational Components & Utilities
goal: Establish reusable components, hooks, and utilities that will be used across multiple user stories.

tasks.description: Create UUID generation utility `frontend/src/utils/uuid.ts` or `backend/src/utils/uuid.ts` (depending on where tasks are initially generated).
Define core `Task` TypeScript interfaces/types in `frontend/src/types/task.ts` and `backend/src/types/task.ts`.
Implement a generic API client utility `frontend/src/services/api-client.ts` to interact with backend routes.
Implement a LocalStorage utility `frontend/src/utils/localStorage.ts` for task persistence.

title: User Story 1: Task CRUD
goal: Implement the core Create, Read, Update, and Delete functionality for tasks, including inline editing.

tasks.description: Create `TaskForm` component for adding new tasks in `frontend/src/components/TaskForm.tsx`.
Create `TaskItem` component for displaying a single task and inline editing in `frontend/src/components/TaskItem.tsx`.
Create `TaskList` component to render all tasks using `TaskItem`s in `frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx`.
Implement basic state management for tasks (e.g., using `useState` or `useReducer`) within `frontend/src/pages/index.tsx` or a dedicated context.
Integrate `TaskForm` and `TaskList` into the main application page `frontend/src/pages/index.tsx`.
Implement client-side validation for task title (1-100 characters, not empty) in `frontend/src/components/TaskForm.tsx`.
Add Jest unit tests for `TaskForm`, `TaskItem`, and `TaskList` components in `frontend/src/components/__tests__/TaskForm.test.tsx`, etc.
Add integration tests for CRUD operations on the UI using React Testing Library.

title: User Story 2: Filters
goal: Enable users to filter tasks by status (All, Completed, Pending) and priority (Low, Medium, High).

tasks.description: Create `FilterControls` component with status and priority selection in `frontend/src/components/FilterControls.tsx`.
Implement filtering logic within the state management layer of `frontend/src/pages/index.tsx` (or context).
Integrate `FilterControls` with `TaskList` to apply filters.
Implement default sorting by `createdAt` (newest first).
Add Jest unit tests for `FilterControls` component and filtering logic.

title: User Story 3: Task Priority
goal: Visually indicate task priority and allow sorting by priority.

tasks.description: Enhance `TaskItem` component to display color-coded priority badges based on `priority` prop in `frontend/src/components/TaskItem.tsx`.
(Optional) Add a sort control for priority in `frontend/src/components/FilterControls.tsx`.
Add Jest unit tests for priority display and optional sorting logic.

title: User Story 4: Local Storage & Offline Handling
goal: Ensure task persistence across browser reloads and provide a robust offline experience with conflict resolution.

tasks.description: Modify task state management to sync with `LocalStorage` using the `frontend/src/utils/localStorage.ts` utility.
Implement network status detection and display an offline notification banner in `frontend/src/components/OfflineBanner.tsx`.
Develop a queueing mechanism for API calls in `frontend/src/services/api-client.ts` to store requests during offline periods.
Implement logic to process the API call queue and sync with the backend when online.
Implement conflict resolution strategy (last-write-wins) for tasks, including user notification for overwrites.
Add integration tests for LocalStorage persistence, offline behavior, queuing, and conflict resolution.

title: User Story 5: Backend Integration
goal: Implement Next.js API routes for task CRUD operations and integrate frontend with these routes.

tasks.description: Implement `GET /tasks` API route in `backend/src/api/tasks/route.ts` (Next.js App Router API route or similar).
Implement `POST /tasks` API route in `backend/src/api/tasks/route.ts`.
Implement `PUT /tasks/{id}` API route in `backend/src/api/tasks/[id]/route.ts`.
Implement `DELETE /tasks/{id}` API route in `backend/src/api/tasks/[id]/route.ts`.
Implement server-side validation for task data in `backend/src/utils/validation.ts`.
Configure rate-limiting for API routes (e.g., using a middleware or a library).
Modify `frontend/src/services/api-client.ts` to use the new backend API routes for all CRUD operations.
Add integration tests for all API routes (backend) and full-stack integration tests for frontend-to-backend communication.

title: User Story 6: Optional Enhancements
goal: Implement optional, non-critical features that enhance user experience. These can be prioritized separately.

tasks.description: Implement drag-and-drop reordering for `TaskItem`s within `TaskList` in `frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx`.
Ensure drag-and-drop reordering persists to LocalStorage and Backend API.
Implement an undo mechanism for the last task add, delete, or edit action.
Create and integrate a notification (toast/snackbar) system for task completion in `frontend/src/components/Notification.tsx`.
Add unit/integration tests for optional enhancements.

title: Polish & Cross-Cutting Concerns
goal: Address cross-cutting concerns like accessibility, performance, comprehensive testing, documentation, and deployment readiness.

tasks.description: Perform accessibility audit and implement fixes (keyboard navigation, ARIA, color contrast) across `frontend/src/components/` and `frontend/src/pages/`.
Implement performance optimizations (memoization, lazy loading, list virtualization if needed) in `frontend/src/components/`.
Write comprehensive unit and integration tests to achieve â‰¥80% coverage for core functionality.
Create/update `README.md` with project overview, setup, features, and deployment instructions.
Generate/update API documentation (`docs/api.md` or similar) for backend endpoints.
Ensure all components, functions, and hooks have appropriate inline comments.
Finalize Vercel deployment configuration and CI/CD pipeline (`.github/workflows/main.yml`).
Conduct final end-to-end testing and performance profiling before release.
